alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL DELTA... SOUTHEASTERN MARQUETTE AND SOUTHWESTERN ALGER COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Trenary, or 24 miles southeast of Marquette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenary, U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, Kiva, and Diffin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
